name: The Hunger Cycle
description:
This is an in progress little branching path story game I made based on a bunch of kinks.

 I plan on expanding on it (heh) in the future, but for now it's just mean to scratch an itch and leave a lot up to interpretation.

It focuses on weight gain mostly, and feeder fantasies, but includes hucow, rapid weight gain, and blueberry inflation.

Lemme know your thoughts or if you run into any bugs!
